scripts.docker:dev:https: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.local-https.yml up --build
scripts.docker:prod:https: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml -f docker-compose.local-https.yml up --build
scripts.docker:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.local-https.yml down
scripts.docker:logs: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.local-https.yml logs -f
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.local-https.yml down -v --rmi all
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:dev:https
